The aroma that comes from Irene's house makes you go to her restaurant in a second, as if you were hypnotized. With more than two years' experience selling food, this entrepreneur feels that her business is improving every day, even more so when she invests in it, she says. Previously, she had a loan, and she is grateful to all of the people who helped her. She was able to buy beef, chicken, fruit and basic grains to stock her business.

Upon seeing the positive results of this last investment, Irene wants to do it again. For this reason, she is asking for a loan to buy rice, beans, chicken, beef, sugar and fruit to prepare the best food and the best beverages. With this, her clientele will grow and she can have more profits. In the future, she would like to ask for a home loan in order to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, chicken, beef, sugar, and fruit.

loans.name: Arzigul

texts.ru: Арзигул, 53 года, замужем, есть сын. Работает преподавателем в школе. В поиске дополнительного источника доходов для своей семьи, Арзигул 20 лет занимается животноводством и садоводством. Благодаря ее непосильному труду и емкой работе, Арзигул достигла хороших успехов и стала получать ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве имеется 2 коровы, 18 овец. Арзигул обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS), который она направит на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Арзигул планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Arzigul is 53 years old, married, and has a son. She works as a school teacher. In search of an additional source of income for her family, for the last 20 years Arzigul has reared animals and grown crops. Thanks to back-breaking labor and much work, Arzigul has achieved good success and started earning a monthly income of 30,000 som (KGS). Today she has two cows and 18 sheep. Arzigul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) which she will use to buy livestock. Arzigul plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Sharapat

texts.ru: Шарапат, 45 лет, в разводе, есть 2 детей. У нее среднее образование и хороший стаж. В 2010 году Шарапат стала заниматься полеводством, накопив на старт сумму в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Шарапат на сегодняшний день у нее есть 1,74 ГА земли, где выращивает органическую кукурузу и помидоры на продажу. Всю экологически чистую, вкусную продукцию она реализует оптовым покупателям. Шарапат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян, удобрений для обработки почвы и выращивания органических продуктов. Кредит поможет Шарапат развить ее бизнес и обучить детей в хороших университетах.
texts.en: Sharapat is 45 years old, divorced, and has two children. She has a secondary education and good work experience. In 2010 Sharapat started growing crops, having saved up a sum of 10,000 som (KGS) to get started. Thanks to her hard work, today Sharapat has 1.74 hectares of land where she grows organic corn and tomatoes for sale. She sells all of her environmentally friendly, tasty produce to wholesale buyers. Sharapat has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy seeds and fertilizer to treat her land and grow organic produce. The loan will help Sharapat to develop her business and educate her children in good universities.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to treat her land and grow organic corn and tomatoes.

loans.name: Juana Pastora

texts.es:
Muñecos de diferentes estilos cuelgan del techo del negocio de Juana, una emprendedora de 45 años de edad que lleva más de diez años elaborando y vendiendo piñatas. La creatividad ha sido el principal motor de su negocio, complementándolo con las inversiones para obtener los materiales principales para la creación de este elemento fundamental para los cumpleaños. El crecimiento ha sido veraz, por lo que se siente agradecida con todas las personas que le ayudaron con un préstamo anterior con el cual compró todos los materiales necesarios para producir más y poder tener más ventas.
Actualmente desea volver a invertir en su negocio, por lo que solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar cartones, cartulina, papel periódico, pega, tijeras, entre otros materiales indispensables para la producción de estas piñatas que tanto son anheladas por los niños y las niñas en sus cumpleaños. Juana cuenta con el apoyo de su hija, por esta razón se siente segura de hacer crecer el negocio en familia. Al cancelar le gustaría concentrarse en mejorar las condiciones de su casa.
texts.en:
Different styled dolls hang from the ceiling of Juana's business. She is a 45 year old entrepreneur that has been developing and selling piñatas for more than 10 years. Creativity has been the main driving force of her business, complementing it with investments to get the main materials for building this fundamental birthday component. The growth has been real and she feels very thankful for all of the people that helped her with the previous loan, with which she bought all of the necessary materials to make more and to be able to have more sales. 

Now she wishes to reinvest in her business, so she is asking for a new loan to buy cardboard, poster board, newspaper, glue, scissors, among other indispensable materials for the production of these piñatas that are so desired by boys and girls on their birthdays. Juana counts on the support of her daughter and for this reason she feels safe growing the family business. Once she has paid it off, she would like to focus on improving the conditions of her home.

loans.use: to buy cardboard, poster board, newspaper, glue, scissors, among others.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María es una joven carismática de 24 años, vive en casa propia en un Recinto perteneciente a la ciudad de Santo Domingo, lugar caracterizado por la producción de plátano de exportación y cacao.
María es muy trabajadora y alegre, siempre está sonriendo, desde hace años atrás se dedica a la venta de ropa por catálogo, ella recorre visitando a su clientela; gracias a estos ingresos ella pudo comprarse unos chanchitos los cuales los cría, ya tiene las chancheras para su crianza; comenta que gracias a los créditos de la Fundación ella ha podido progresar e incrementar sus negocios, ya que además de esto ella también vende celulares.
María está muy agradecida con los créditos, porque ha podido salir adelante poco a poco; ahora este dinero lo invertirá en la compra de más ropa, calcetines e interiores ya que es la temporada estudiantil y es donde incrementan sus ventas; con las ganancias generadas desea también poder seguir criando a sus chanchitos, para ser una microempresaria reconocida en su sector y además seguir mejorando su vivienda.
texts.en:
Maria is a charismatic young woman of 24 years. She lives in her own house in an area belonging to the city of Santo Domingo, a place known for the production of bananas for exportation and cacao.

Maria is very hard-working and cheerful. She is always smiling. For years she has been making a living by selling clothes by catalog. She goes around visiting her customres. 

Thanks to this income she was able to buy some pigs to raise. She already has a pigsty for them.

She says, thanks to the credit bank's loans she has been able to progress and increase her business because now she is also selling cell phones. Maria is very thankful for the loans because she has been able to improve her financial situation little by little. Now she wants to invest this money to buy more clothes, socks and underwear, because it is the beginning of the school term, where her sales increase.

With the generated income she also wants to continue raising her pigs, and to be a recognized micro-entrepreneur in her area, and also further improve her home.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock up for the beginning of the school term.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.pt:
A senhora Cecilia tem 47 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de 05 filhos dos quais 02 frequentam o ensino escolar e 03 não estudam, porém, todos estão na sua responsabilidade. Vive na casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo de 30.000,00mts pretende comprar duvetes, mantas, sapatos, saias, arroz, óleo, frangos para revender.
A cliente sonha em ter uma capoeira para criar frangos como forma de reforçar a renda.
O seu desafio é reembolsar o empréstimo para solicitar outros de modo a dar continuidade dos seus serviços.
texts.en:
Cecilia is 47 years old and is a single mother to five children, two of whom are in school and three of whom are not. She lives in her own home, and all of her children depend on her financially. 

With this loan of 30,000 Mozambican meticals she plans to buy comforters, blankets, shoes, skirts, rice, cooking oil, and chickens to sell. Cecilia's dream is to have a chicken coop where she can raise chickens as a way to supplement her monthly income. Her main goal is to pay off this loan in order to be able to request more loans and thus continue with her business ventures.

loans.use: buy comforters, blankets, shoes, skirts, rice, cooking oil, and chickens to sell.

loans.name: 24 De Junio Group

texts.es:
El grupo 24 de junio está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 4 integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir que ellas están en una pobreza extrema. Todas están poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Virginia, quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos variados, de manera a poder tener los medios para ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere mejorar cada día, y espera crecer y mejorar, es por ello que forma parte de este grupo.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar cosméticos variados para la venta, y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
The 24 de Junio group is completing the poverty elimination tool, where 4 members are found below the poverty line, which is to say that are in extreme poverty. All are putting forth their best efforts to be able to improve their living conditions and that of their loved ones.

One of the members is Virginia, who works selling a variety of cosmetics in order to be able to have the means to help her family and her loved ones. She is a very hard-working and determined woman who wants to improve each day and hopes to grow and improve, and for this she is part of the group. 

She asks for this loan to be able to purchase a variety of cosmetics to sell, and with this to be able to continue with her work as she has been doing. She is grateful for this opportunity she is getting.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of cosmetics for sale.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas De Lambare Group

texts.es:
19 son las mujeres que se unieron para poder trabajar y salir adelante, están en su ciclo número 7 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas están poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder salir adelante.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Luz, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que poco a poco  y a través del esfuerzo ha ido creciendo y por medio de la venta de comestibles que hace ella misma y que después sale a vender. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que se esfuerza por poder salir adelante.
La Sra. Luz solicita de este préstamo para la compra de insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, carne, condimentos, pollo, y otros,  lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, y así mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: 19 women joined together to be able to work and get ahead. They are in their 7th cycle of the women's program committee, where they all are putting in their best effort to be able to get ahead. One of the members is Luz, who showed a poverty level within three on her last survey, which says that little by little through effort she has grown and also from selling groceries that she makes herself and later goes out and sells. She is a very hard-working and enterprising woman that strives to get ahead. Luz is asking for this loan to buy supplies to be able to make her foods, such as vegetables, meat, condiments, chicken, etc., which will help her to specify her business plan and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy supplies to be able to make their food, such as vegetables, meat, condiments, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Villeta Poty Group

texts.es:
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Sra. Virgilia quien tiene una despensa, es una mujer muy trabajadora, que está luchando por su familia y por sus seres queridos, ya que ella es la principal sostén de sus seres queridos.
Virgilia comenta que el grupo se formó en la ciudad de Itá, para poder capacitarse y poder mejorar cada día con la ayuda de la fundación paraguaya.
Ella pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para su despensa, como ser verduras, frutas, bebidas, lácteos, y otros. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
One of the members of this group is Virgilia who has a general store. She is a very hard-working woman who is struggling for her family and for her loved ones, since she is the primary provider who supports her loved ones.

Virgilia says that the group was formed in the city of Itá to be able to get training and be able to improve each day with the help of Fundación Paraguaya.

She asks for this loan to purchase supplies for her store such as vegetables, fruits, drinks, dairy products and more. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving to improve each day.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, fruit, drinks, dairy products, and more.

loans.name: Divino Niño Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Divino Niño está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité de mujeres. Está ubicado en la ciudad de Caacupé, las 15  integrantes del comité realizan muchos esfuerzos para así poder salir adelante junto con sus familias. 
La señora Gladys, una de las integrantes ayuda al sostenimiento de su familia con la venta de productos por catálogo, como perfumes, cremas, etc. Ella está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder crecer y salir adelante.
El  fin del préstamo es para la compra de artículos varios para la venta, para poder cumplir con la demanda y pedidos de sus clientes. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere crecer y salir adelante todo por sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group called Divino Niño is in its 6th loan cycle in the women's committee program. It is located in the city of Caacupé. The 15 members of the committee exert a lot of effort to be able to get ahead with their families. 

Gladys, one of the members, helps to support her family with the sale of catalog products such as perfumes, creams, etc. She is putting her best effort into being able to grow and get ahead. 

The purpose of the loan is to purchase various products to sell, to be able to meet the demand and customers' orders. She is a very hard-working and determined woman who wants to grow and get ahead, all for her loved ones.

loans.use: to purchase various products to sell such as perfumes, creams and more.

loans.name: Aizada

texts.ru: Айзада, 41 год, замужем, мать 7 детей. Дети и супруг активно помогают по хозяйству. У Айзады - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и растениеводством, начав свою деятельность в 1995 году с 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря целеустремленности, упорству и трудолюбию Айзады, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 5 коров, 45 овец, 3 лошади. Также Айзада арендует 3,0 ГА земли, где выращивает люцерну и пшеницу. Айзада продает молочные продукты, ее ежемесячный доход составляет 24,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айзада обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айзада планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и планирует накопить средства на приобретение собственного земельного участка.
texts.en: Aizada is 41 years old, married, and the mother of seven children. Her children and husband actively help her on the farm. Aizada has a secondary education. She rears animals and grows crops as the main source of income for her family, having started in 1995 with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Aizada's ambition, perseverance and hard work, today she has five cows, 45 sheep, and three horses. Aizada also rents three hectares of land she she grows alfalfa and wheat. Aizada sells dairy products. Her monthly income is 24,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her farm, Aizada has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep in order to increase her herd. Aizada plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her herd of domestic livestock and plans to save up money to buy her own plot of land.

loans.use: to purchase some sheep in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Delio

texts.es:
El Señor Delio es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, tiene 55 años de edad, él se dedica a la compra y venta de alfalfa hace más de 10 años aproximadamente.
Él es una persona muy trabajadora que poco a poco se ha ido sacrificando para poder sacar adelante a su familia y a sus hijos. Está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder mejorar cada día.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar alfalfa para la venta, y seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Delio is from the city of Paraguarí. He is 55 years old and has made a living buying and selling alfalfa for more than approximately 10 years. He is a very hard-working person that has sacrificed little by little to be able to provide for his family and his children. He is putting forth his best effort to be able to improve every day. He is asking for this loan to be able to buy alfalfa for sale and to continue with his job as he has always done.

loans.use: to buy alfalfa for sale.

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Antonio está en su ciclo número 1, es un grupo nuevo que se propuso poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de cada una de las integrantes. Están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde una de las integrantes es la Sra. Claudelina.
Ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de la venta de empanadas que hace viene teniendo los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Se destaca en el grupo por poner todo de su para mejorar cada día.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus empandas, como ser verduras, carne, hortalizas y otros, de manera a seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad de seguir mejorando cada día.
texts.en:
The group called San Antonio is in its first loan cycle. It is a new group that proposes being able to improve the living conditions of each of the members. It is in the poverty elimination program, and one of the members is Claudelina. 

Through her efforts and continuous work, and through the sales of empanadas that she does, she has been having the means to be able to help her family and her loved ones. She stands out in the group for putting her all into improving each day. 

She asks for this loan to be able to purchase supplies to be able to continue making her empanadas, such as vegetables, meat, greens, and more, so as to continue with her sales as she has been doing. She is grateful for the opportunity to continue improving each day.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as vegetables, meat, greens and more.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Francisco está en su ciclo número 13 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde dos señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir, en una pobreza extrema.
Entre el trabajo que ellas hacen se destaca la Sra. Cinthia, quien se dedica a la peluquería y también a la manicura, tiene muchas clientas que gracias al buen trabajo que ella hace, se viene abriendo camino. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere seguir luchando y esforzándose.
La Sra. Cinthia solicita  este crédito para invertir en su negocio personal que es la peluquería y la manicura, quiere comprar tintes, shampoo, enjuagues, esmaltes, limas, alicates y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de crecer día a día.
texts.en:
The San Francisco group is in its 13th loan cycle in the women's committee program, where they all work and help each other get ahead. They are completing the poverty elimination tool, where two of the ladies are below the poverty line, which is to say, in extreme poverty. 

Among the work that they do, Cinthia stands out. She works does hair and manicures. She has many customers and, thanks to the good work she does, she is making headway. She is a very hard-working and determined woman who wants to continue struggling and working hard. 

Cinthia asks for this loan to invest in her personal business which is a beauty salon and manicures. She wants to purchase dyes, shampoo, rinses, nail polish, nail files, clippers and more, so to be able to continue with her work as she has been doing. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is getting to grow each day.

loans.use: to purchase dyes, shampoo, rinses, nail polish, nail files, clippers and more to use in her work.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La señora Julia es casada, tiene tres hijos, es dueña de una despensa y también tiene una mercería bien surtida con buena ubicación con clientela bien formada.
Es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y muy honesta, se esmera cada dia para poder salir adelante y de alcanzar sus objetivos, empezó con un pequeño negocio, pero con el correr del tiempo se ha hecho muy conocida.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar productos varios para su mercería, como ser prendas, calzados y artículos de bazar, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en: Julia is married and has three children. She is the owner of a small shop and she also has a well-stocked haberdashery in a good location with a shapely clientele. She is a hard-working, responsible and very honest person. She strives each day to be able to get ahead and reach her goals. She started with a small business, but over time she has become very well-known. She is asking for this loan to be able to buy various products for her haberdashery, such as garments, footwear and bazaar items and with that she will be able to continue with her sales as she has always done. She is thankful for the opportunity that she receives to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy haberdashery, such as garments, footwear and bazaar items.

loans.name: Eleuterio

texts.es:
Visitar la finca de Eleuterio sirve de inspiración de superación para cualquiera, puesto que este hombre de 36 años de edad, con más de 21 años de experiencia en el mundo de la agricultura ha sabido invertir de una buena forma los créditos anteriores que ha obtenido y con los cuales ha tenido grandes resultados. Por esta razón, quiere agradecer a todas las personas que lo apoyaron con el último préstamo, con el cual pudo pagar a los trabajadores y compró insumos para la siembra de maíz y frijol que trajeron grandes ganancias para su negocio y para su familia. 
Ahora este productor agropecuario se siente más que motivado con seguir invirtiendo, razón suficiente por la cual solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar abono, fertilizantes y pagar a sus trabajadores en esta nueva cosecha de frijoles. Con esto podrá cumplir en tiempo y forma su siembra para aprovechar el invierno y tener excelentes resultados. Al cancelar no duda en seguir mejorando su finca, para seguir mejorando la calidad de vida de él y de su familia.
texts.en:
Visiting Eleuterio's farm serves as inspiration to overcome for anyone, since this 36-year-old man, with over 21 years of experience in the world of agriculture, has managed to invest in a good way previous loans earned, with which he has had great results. For this reason, he wants to thank all the people who supported him with the last loan, with which he could pay workers and bought supplies for planting corn and beans that brought great profits for his business and his family.

Now this farmer feels more than motivated to keep investing, reason enough for requesting a new loan to buy compost, fertilizer, and pay his workers in this new crop of beans. With this, he can yield his crop in time to take advantage of winter and have excellent results. Once he repays, he will no doubt continue to improve his farm, to further improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, and to pay his workers.

loans.name: Gloire À Dieu Group

texts.fr: Téné, membre représentatif, est mariée et mère de 3 enfants. Elle fait la teinture et en même temps la couture. Téné a besoin de crédit pour acheter son matériel de couture(aiguille, popeline, de bouton, du file,...) des pagnes qu'elle va teindre et vendre. Sa proximité avec le marché fait qu'elle à une bonne clientèle. Après ses ventes et son service rendu à sa clientèle à travers la couture, Téné aura un bénéfice qui lui permettra d'aider à faire les dépenses de sa famille.
texts.en: Téné, the group representative, is married and the mother of 3 children. She dyes clothing and sews. Téné needs this loan in order to buy sewing material (needles, poplin, buttons, thread, etc.) and pagnes (highly decorative West African cloth) which she will dye and sell. Her close proximity to the market means that she has a lot of customers. After making her sales and selling her sewing services, Téné will make a profit which will help her to contribute to her family's expenditures.

loans.use: to buy sewing material, pagnes and dye for resale.

loans.name: Bayiri-Nooma Group

texts.fr: Téné,membre représentatif est marié et mère de 3 enfants tous scolarisés. Le groupe de Téné est à son 13ème contrat de prêt avec ACFIME et les remboursements se font bien. Cette brave dame vend du savon et cela fait 7 ans. Elle a besoin de ce crédit pour commander du savon en Côte d'Ivoire et aussi fabriquer du savon liquide pour vendre. Pour satisfaire sa clientèle, Téné fait de son mieux pour éviter les ruptures de stock.Après ses ventes, elle aura un bénéfice qui permettra de faire l'épargne mais aussi de s'occuper de sa famille.
texts.en: Téné, the group's representative, is married and the mother of 3 children who all go to school. Téné's group is on its 13th loan from ACFIME and the repayments are being correctly made. This brave woman has been selling soap for 7 years. She needs this loan so that she can order some Côte d'Ivoire soap and make some liquid soap for resale. Téné does the best she can to avoid stock shortages and satisfy her clientele. When she has made her sales, she will have a profit that will enable her to build her savings but also to take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy soap with which to make liquid soap for retail.

loans.name: Gina

texts.pt:
Gina tem 38 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de 04 filhos dos quais 03 frequentam o ensino escolar e 01não tem idade escolar, todavia, todos estão na sua responsabilidade. Vive na casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo de 25.000,00mts pretende comprar produtos da 1a necessidade para revender na sua mercearia, tais como: arroz, peixe, feijão, óleo da cozinha, bolachas, refrigerantes, bebidas e outros produtos básicos.
A cliente tem como sonho, prosperar nos seus negócios, melhorar as condiçoes habitacionais e da dieta alimentar.
Apesar de dificuldades financeiras, seu desafio é reembolsar o empréstimo para solicitar outros de modo a dar continuidade dos seus serviços.
texts.en:
Gina is 38 years old and is a single mother to four children, three of whom are in school. Her fourth child is not yet of school age, and all of her children depend on her financially. They live in their own home.

With this loan of 25,000 Mozambican meticals Gina plans to buy basic food products to sell at her store, such as rice, fish, beans, cooking oil, cookies, soft drinks, and other drinks and staple products. Gina's dream is for her business to prosper and to improve her family's diet and living conditions. Despite her financial difficulties, her plan is to pay back this loan in order to be able to take out others and thus continue with her business ventures.

loans.use: buy rice, fish, beans, cooking oil, cookies, soft drinks, and other drinks and basic products.

loans.name: Toribio

texts.es:
Toribio es de la ciudad de Santaní, tiene hijos, y es una familia muy trabajadora, comenta que tiene una despensa con carnicería.
Toribio es una persona trabajadora, responsable y muy honesta, comenta que  empezó a trabajar con un pequeño kiosco y en las ventas de comidas rápidas. Su sueño de siempre era de tener una despensa y con su trabajo pudo cumplirlo.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su despensa, como ser verduras, frutas, bebidas, panificados y otros, para poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder salir adelante y mejorar.
texts.en: Toribio is in the city of Santaní. He has children and a very hard-working family. He has a small shop with a butchery. Toribio is a hard-working, responsible and very honest person. He started to work in a small kiosk and in fast-food sales. His dream has always been to have a shop and with his work he was able to fulfill it. He is asking for this loan to be able to invest it in buying supplies for his shop, such as vegetables, fruits, drinks, baked goods and other things, in order to continue with his job as he has always done. He is thankful for the opportunity that he receives to be able to get ahead and improve.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits, drinks, baked goods and other things.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas agropecuarias, ya que ve una gran oportunidad en la tierra del país.
Es una persona que se esfuerza mucho por cumplir con sus metas y objetivos. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Carlos is from the city of Caaguazú. He is studying farm management because he sees a great opportunity in the country's land. He is a person that tries hard to fulfill his goals and objectives. He is asking for a loan to be able to pay the degree's costs and thus be able to continue with his studies as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Hector es de la ciudad de Santaní, esta estudiando la carrera de administración agropecuaria, es una persona muy esforzada que quiere salir adelante, y es por ello que esta poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder crecer y salir adelante. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación.
Pide este préstamo nuevamente para poder pagar sus gastos de universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Hector is from the city of Santaní. He is studying farm management. He is a very hardworking person that wants to get ahead and for that reason he is putting forth his best effort to be able to grow and get ahead. He says that his previous loan was used to cover the certification costs. He is asking for a new loan to be able to pay for his university expenses and in this manner he will be able to continue with his studies as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two bales of second-hand trousers and dresses.

loans.name: Huseyin

texts.en:
Huseyin is 59 year old, married and he has 2 kids. Huseyin is an internally displaced person (IDP) and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. 

He is a talented, respected, professional man. Huseyin is a dairy farmer. He started keeping dairy cows 25 years ago. Since then, he has been able to grow his business steadily to a point where he is able to get more than 10 litres of milk every day that he sells to his community.

Huseyin started this business with a small amount of capital. Thanks to his hard work, he has been able to develop and expand his merchandise. The profits from this business have allowed him to expand his sales volume.

He has already borrowed four loans from Aqroinvest in the past. With a good loan history, Huseyin has applied for a fifth loan of 500 AZN. With this money, he wants to buy feed for his cows. He thanks Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: to buy feed for his cows

loans.name: Sandra

texts.pt:
A senhora Sandra tem 39 anos de idade, divorciada e mãe de 04 filhos que frequentam o ensino escolar e todos estão na sua responsabilidade. Vive na casa própria.
Com o valor do empréstimo de 20.000,00mts pretende comprar produtos da 1a necessidade para revender na sua mercearia, tais como: arroz, peixe, feijão, óleo da cozinha, bolachas, refrigerantes, bebidas e outros produtos básicos.
A cliente tem como sonho, ter um restaurante  e oferecer todos os serviços que possam satisfazer a comunidade local.
O seu desafio é reembolsar o empréstimo para solicitar outros de modo a dar continuidade dos seus serviços.
texts.en:
Sandra is 39 years old and is the divorced mother of four children, all of whom are in school and all of whom depend on her financially. She lives in her own home.

With this loan of 20,000 Mozambican meticals, Sandra plans to buy staple food products to sell at her store, such as rice, fish, beans, cooking oil, cookies, soft drinks, and other drinks and products. Sandra's dream is to have her own restaurant that would provide services satisfying the needs of her local community. She plans to pay back this loan in order to be able to take out others and thus continue with her business ventures.

loans.use: buy rice, fish, beans, cooking oil, cookies, soft drinks, and other drinks and staple food products.

loans.name: Bassima

texts.en:
Along with her husband, 49-year-old Bassima owns a bakery that helps them cover the increasing financial demands of their three children. While the business struggled a bit at first, it has since been able to provide a steady income for Bassima and her husband.

Bassima is trying hard to develop her business, thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to renovate her bakery and buy a Frisco machine to attract customers and satisfy their requests.

In the future, Bassima hopes to diversify her products and purchase the equipment necessary to produce sweets at her bakery, so that she can continue growing her successful business.

loans.use: to renovate her bakery and buy a Frisco machine

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder crecer y mejorar cada día, ella está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder ser una buena psicóloga, ya que esa es la carrera que está estudiando.
Comenta que por medio de su esfuerzo está creciendo y luchando por cumplir su sueño. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y así cumplir su suelo de ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en: Lourdes is putting forth her best effort to be able to grow and improve each day. She is putting in her best effort to be able to be a good psychologist because this is the degree that she is studying. She says that through the sacrifice she is growing and fighting to fulfill her dream. She is asking for this loan to be able to pay for the fees of her degree and thus fulfill her dream of being someone in life.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
Isidro es estudiante de veterinaria está en el cuarto año de la carrera, está casado y tiene una hija por quien está luchando ya que quiere darle una vida digna. Su meta es terminar su carrera para darle una vida mejor a su familia y trabajar en la carrera que le gusta.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera y con ello estar cerca de su meta.
texts.en: Isidro is a veterinary student who is in his 4th year of the degree. He is married and has a daughter for whom he is fighting because he wants to give her a decent life. His goal is to finish his degree to give his family a better life and to work in the career that he likes. He is asking for the loan to be able to pay for his degree fees and thus be closer to his goal.

loans.use: to pay degree fees.

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru: Наргиза, 25 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее высшее образование, на протяжении 4 лет она занимается торговлей одеждой. У Наргизы на сегодняшний день есть товар в обороте на сумму 200,000 сом (KGS). Ее прибыль на сегодня составляет 24,500 сом (KGS). Наргиза обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку товара для пополнения ассортимента и привлечения новых покупателей. Доходы от кредита Наргиза планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства, а также на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Nargiza is 25 years old, married, and the mother of two children. She has a higher education, and for the last four years she has been selling clothing. Today Nargiza has goods in stock worth 200,000 som (KGS). Her current profit is 24,500 som (KGS). Nargiza has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy goods to replenish her product range and attract new customers. Nargiza plans to use the proceeds of the loan to develop her business and also to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale in order to increase her product range and attract new clients.

loans.name: Sabaly Group

texts.fr:
Morifounè  est le Monsieur qui a la daba à l’épaule. 
Agé de 49 ans, Morifounè   est un cultivateur malien vivant dans une commune rurale  du Mali. Il est marié et père de dix (10) enfants âgés de 3 mois à 20 ans, dont deux (2) filles vont à l’école. Sa femme fait le jardinage pour gagner sa vie.
Morifounè   n’est pas alphabétisé. Son activité est basée sur la culture des vivres  et de l’arachide. Il n’a pas les moyens pour mener à bien son activité, c’est pourquoi Morifounè  fait  recourt au prêt du RMCR.
Avec le prêt il achètera plus de semence d’arachide de l’engrais chimique et des bras valide pour labourer et défricher son champ d’arachide qui est son activité génératrice de revenu.
Son rêve est de pouvoir aider ses filles à réussir au BAC. Il prévoit un bénéfice de 215 000 FCFA pendant la période de récolte.
texts.en:
Morifounè is the man holding the axe over his shoulder.

49-year-old Morifounè is a Malian farmer who lives in a rural commune in Mali. He is married and the father of 10 children aged between 3 months and 20 years, 2 of whom, both girls, attend school. His wife earns a living doing gardening. Morifounè is illiterate. His business is based on the cultivation of food and groundnuts. He does not have the means to carry out his business which is why he is turning to RMCR for a loan. With this loan, he will buy groundnut seeds and chemical fertiliser and hire manual labourers to work on and clear his field of groundnuts, which is how he earns his living. His dream is to be able to help his girls to get their bachelor degrees. He expects to make a profit of 215 000 francs during the harvest time.

loans.use: to buy groundnut seeds and chemical fertiliser for his field.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.pt:
O sr Tomás tem 32 anos de idade, casado e pai de 02 filhos que  frequentam o ensino primário. Para além dos seus filhos, sustenta a sua mãe e os seus sobrinhos que também frenquentam o ensino escolar.
É pintor de profissão e, com o empréstimo de 30.000,00mts, pretende comprar cimento, areia, pedra para fazer acabamentos da sua casa, pois, já começou a construir e o material não é suficiente para conclcuir a sua casa.
Sonha em concluir a sua casa para confortar a sua familia e o seu desafio é reembolsar o empréstimo dentro do prazo acordado
texts.en:
Tomás is 32 years old and is married with two children who are both in elementary school. Besides his two children, he also cares for his mother and two nephews, both of whom are also in school. 

Tomás works as a painter, and with this loan of 30,000 Mozambican meticals he plans to buy cement, sand, and stones in order to finish work on his house, because the construction is already underway but he does not have enough material to finish it. Tomás' goal is to finish this home construction project in order to improve his family's life and he plans to repay this loan as promised.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, and stones in order to finish work on his house.

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнура, 24 года, замужем, мать 2 детей, супруг помогает по хозяйству. У Айнуры среднее образование, сельским хозяйством занимается с 2011 года. На сегодня в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 1 лошадь, 5 овец. Также на 1,71 Га  земли Айнура выращивает люцерну для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход Айнуры составляет в среднем 13,000 сом (KGS). Айнура обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Айнура планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и хочет накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Ainura is 24 years old, married, and the mother of two children. Her husband helps her on the farm. Ainura has a secondary education, and has been farming since 2011. Today she has two cows, a horse, and five sheep. She also grows alfalfa on 1.71 hectares of land for use on her own farm and for resale. Ainura's monthly income is 13,000 som (KGS) on average. Ainura has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock to increase her herd. Ainura plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business, and she wants to save up to renovate her house.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 5 boxes of mayonnaise, 15 litres of oil, 3 packages of school books, 2 boxes of Bic pens, 5 kilos of concentrated milk, 1 box of soap, 1 box of bleach and 7 boxes of creams.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha is 42 years old, and is a mother of six.  She is a mother and, like all mothers, she wants to provide all that her kids need, and she is working hard to do this.

Maha has liked birds since her childhood, so from here she decided to start her own business, which is commerce in birds.

She is breeding birds in her home and then she sells them. She said that this business is good for her and she got good income to help her husband with the household expenses.

Now Maha wants to buy new kinds of birds, cages and bird food, but she does not have enough money, therefore she applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy new kinds of birds, cages and bird food

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Leandro Arialdys

texts.es:
Leandro Arialdys es un joven estudiante de Odontología, él solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Leandro Arialdys, soy de Consuelo un pueblo de San Pedro de Macorís, Republica Dominicana. Tengo 21 años de edad y vivo con mi abuela, un tío y mis hermanas. Mi abuela tiene un puesto de comida el cual aporta dinero a la casa. 
Decidí estudiar odontología en la Universidad Central del Este porque es la carrera que me gusta desde que era pequeño. Ya he cursado 4 cuatrimestres y sin embargo esta carrera es una de las más costosas, debido a que la matriculación es alta, además de esto tengo que pagar las clínicas, compra de instrumentos y otros. Mi familia no me puede realizar el pago y compra de los mismos por los pocos recursos que tenemos. Si no encuentro una ayuda de ustedes no podré seguir estudiando. 
Si me aprueba este préstamo voy a estudiar mucho y hacer mi mayor esfuerzo para graduarme y trabajar en lo que me gusta, para ofrecer un servicio de odontología de primera.
texts.en:
Leandro Arialdys is a young dentistry student. He is asking for a loan to be able to cover his education expenses. 
This is his story: My name is Leandro Arialdys. I am from Consuelo, a town of San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic. I am 21 years old and I live with my grandmother, an uncle and my sisters. My grandmother has a food stand that brings money home. I decided to study dentistry at the Universidad Central de Este because it is the career that I have most liked since I was little. I have already completed 4 quarters, however this career is one of the most expensive because enrollment is high. In addition to this, I have to pay for the clinical trainings, purchase of instruments and other things. My family cannot make the payments and purchases of these things from the little resources that we have. If I do not find aide from you, I will not be able to continue studying. If you approve this loan for me, I am going to study a lot and do my best to graduate and work in what I like, to offer a first-class dentistry service.

loans.use: to cover higher education expenses.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es:
Ruth está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, su mayor aspiración es de ser una excelente profesional al recibirse y poder retribuir a su familia el esfuerzo que han hecho para  salir adelante. 
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder seguir luchando por cumplir con sus metas y anhelos.
texts.en:
Ruth is studying a nursing career. Her greatest ambition is to be an excellent professional upon graduation and to give back to her family the effort they have made to succeed.

She is requesting this loan to pay her career fees, and thus continue striving to fulfill her goals and aspirations.

loans.use: to pay for college fees.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa es una señora muy alegre, ella nunca se caso ni tampoco tuvo hijos, los únicos que le acompañan son unos perritos a los que los quiere mucho, Rosa se dedica a la crianza de animales menores desde que tenía 12 años de edad ya que cuando vivía con su madre le enseñaba a esta actividad, Rosa necesita el crédito para comprar chanchos, ya que esa es su fuente de ingresos económicos, lo que Rosa  aspira es comprarse otra chancha grande para tenerla de reproductora y comercializar los chanchitos y de ahí cubrir los gastos de alimento, salud y vivienda. Rosa piensa a futuro ya que vive sola y le gustaría tener una vejez digna.
texts.en: Rosa is a very happy woman. She was never married nor had any children. The only company that she has are some dogs that she loves very much. Rosa has made a living raising young animals since she was 12 years old, because when her mother was alive she taught her this occupation. Rosa needs the loan to buy pigs, since that is her source of income. Rosa aspires to buy herself another big sow to have reproducing and to market the piglets. This way she can cover food, health and home expenses. Rosa is thinking of her future because she lives alone and she would like to have a dignified old age.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Motheba

texts.en:
Motheba is a 26-year-old mother of 3. She lives on the outskirts of Soweto in previously demarcated farmland now turned into a small bustling township. The population in her area is rapidly growing day-by-day. This influx of people is what prompted Motheba to stop selling food and start a sewing business.

She works hard and has managed to build a steady clientele. Motheba is currently unable to meet the ever growing demand and is therefore desperately in need of funds to expand. She is requesting a loan from Kiva to buy a second sewing machine. She plans to hire one person to operate the second machine.

This loan will greatly improve her business and help her afford school fees for her young children.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Giovana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN JUAN DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia se dedica al negocio de venta de comida, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member belongs to the communal bank “San Juan de Ollantaytambo”. The bank is located in the district of Ollantaytambo, belonging to the Urubamba province and city of Cuzco. She has made a living in the business of selling food. She makes different dishes such as roast chicken, soups and beef stir-fry. She works from 8:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M and has 8 years experience in this business and she is doing very well. Her dream is to have a restaurant. She is asking for a loan to buy products to cook such as rice, vegetables and chicken. She is happy for the loan and promises to fulfill with the payments of her fee.

loans.use: to buy products to cook such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Ujamaa Group

texts.fr: Jacqueline est une commerçante, vice présidente d’une banque communautaire «Ujamaa», mariée à un revendeur du carburant, âgée de 52 ans, mère de 3 enfants tous mariés.  Elle est une vendeuse des poissons salés. Elle installe sa marchandise dans la rue du centre commercial de la ville. Elle débuta avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Plus tard, elle bénéficia le prêt de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 35 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 140 poissons. Ainsi, elle souhaite acheter une parcelle pour ses enfants et accroitre son activité. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation aux femmes entrepreneuses non bancables.
texts.en: Jacqueline is a trader and vice-president of the Ujamaa community bank. She is 52 years old, married to a fuel salesman, and mother to three children, who are all married. She sells salted fish and lays out her goods in a street in the town's shopping centre. She began her business with funds from her husband and subsequently benefited from a loan from IMF Hekima. She has been carrying out this business for the past 35 years. This new loan will be used to buy 140 fish. Through this activity she would like to be able to buy a plot of land for her children and expand her business. Finally she is extremely grateful to Hekima for giving autonomy to female entrepreneurs who cannot access banks.

loans.use: to buy 140 fish.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.pt:
A senhora Carolina Pucane de 52 anos de idade, viuva, com 06 filhos, todos maiores de idade, 3 deles a trabalharem, actualmente só  vive com 2 filhos na casa propria.
Diz  que pretende comprar cimento, cristaleira, para ampliar a sua casa e mobilar, fornecendo assim um lar confortavel a sua familia .
O seu maior sonho e terminar a sua casa completamente e construir mais casas para arrendar.
Diz que tem como desafios insuficiência de fundos e que irá solicitar mais créditos para concretizar o seu plano.
texts.en:
Carolina is 52 years old and is a widow. She has six children, all of whom are past school age and three of whom are working. Two of her children live with her in a house she owns.

With this loan, Carolina plans to buy cement and a glass cabinet in order to expand her house and to furnish it, thus providing a comfortable home for her family. Her main goal is to completely finish this construction project and then build more houses to rent out. Carolina says that her main challenge has been not having enough funds to achieve these goals and that she will take out more loans in the future in order to make her plans a reality.

loans.use: to buy cement and a cabinet in order to expand her house and furnish it.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SAN JUAN DE OLLANTAYTAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.


El socio Roberto  se dedica al negocio de transporte,el socio tiene un mototaxi que hace servicio de taxi, el socio por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de transporte. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar llantas para su mototaxi.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "San Juan de Ollantaytambo".  The bank is located in the district of Ollantaytambo, in the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

The member, Robert, makes a living in transportation.  He has a motorcycle taxi for offering taxi services.  Robert, through means of this business, wants to succeed in life.  His dream is to grow his transportation business.  

Robert asks for the loan in order to buy tires for his motorcycle taxi.  He is happy for the loan and promises to complete the repayments.

loans.use: to buy tires for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more stock of clothes

loans.name: Muhammad

texts.en:
Muhammad is a 24-year-old single man from Jabalia City. He lives with his family in a small house. He works in the distribution of goods on a rickshaw. 

Muhammad would like to improve the family's living conditions and buy all the necessities.

Muhammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water. This will help him to provide hot water for the family house without using electricity. Muhammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the university fees for this semester

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a stock of flour, sugar, bread and other items to enable him open a retail shop

loans.name: Tupendane Group

texts.fr: Sifa est commerçante, conseillère de la banque villageoise «Tupendane», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, veuve, âgée de 49 ans, mère 3 enfants dont 1 étudie et 2 ont fini leurs études. Elle commença son business avec de fonds reçu de ses parents. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires dans un dépôt de la ville depuis son jeune âge. Elle va s’approvisionner en 12 sacs de farine de manioc. Elle compte construire sa maison, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Sifa is a retailer and an advisor to the Tupendane "banque villageoise." She is a client of the MFI Hekima, a widow, 49 years old and the mother of 3 children, one of whom is at school and two of whom have finished their studies. She started her business with funds she received from her parents. She has been selling foodstuffs in a depot in town from a young age. She will buy 12 bags of cassava flour. She plans to build her house and feed and educate her children. Finally, she would like to thank Hekima for the support it gives to non-bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 12 bags of cassava flour.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
In the Philippines, sari-sari stores are everywhere. Sari-sari (a term used for variety) stores sell different kinds of products like biscuits, candies, canned goods, noodles, products used for personal hygiene, and the like, which are involved in every individual’s daily living. This is considered as one of the most common businesses built by ordinary people since it provides commodities for people. 

With this fact, Evelyn was enticed to get in touch with this kind of craft. She is 40 years old, married to Ramil, and a resident of Pasay City, Philippines. By now, they are working with determination to pursue the needs of their family. The income they get from the store helps them with their daily expenditures. 

However, what profit they get from the business is sometimes insufficient. It is because, at times, she finds it hard to maintain supplies of various products due to financial incapability. This is why she is requesting a PHP 40 000 loan that she will utilize to buy additional products for her inventory. With more products displayed in her store, she will be able to have greater increase in her income. 

In due time, she hopes that she grow in progress and that her business will boost in sales. Through this, she can earn and save money for a house someday if God will allow. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members weekly to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies. 

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is comprised of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional products for her inventory

loans.name: Tuongazane A Group

texts.fr: Muvuya est une commerçante, membre d’un groupe de crédit «Tuongazane A», âgée de 45 ans, mariée à un cultivateur, mère de 8 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle est vendeuse des souliers dames au marché de la ville depuis 16 ans. Elle débuta par de fonds reçu de son mari. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre ses activités. Elle va acheter 50 paires de souliers. Ainsi, elle souhaite renforcer son capital, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux femmes entrepreneuses exclues du système bancaire classique.
texts.en: Muvuya is a retailer and a member of the credit group "Tuongazane A." She is 45 years old, married to a farmer and the mother of 8 children who all attend school. She has been selling women's shoes at the market in town for 16 years. She started with funds she received from her husband. She is requesting a loan from Hekima so that she can increase her business. She will buy 50 pairs of shoes. She wants to reinforce her working capital and to ensure that her children are fed and get an education. She thanks Hekima for the support it gives to female entrepreneurs who are excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to buy 50 pair of shoes.

loans.name: Aventina

texts.pt:
A senhora Aventina é comerciante  tem 40 anos de idade, é mae viuva de 06 filhos, dos quais 01 ainda menor de idade, 05 a estudar, vive na casa propria, sustenta um neto que vive com ela.
Diz que com este crédito ira comprar  cimento, areia, barrotes  e chapas de zinco. 
Planos para o futuro, crescimento no negocio, terminar a construçao e adquirir uma viatura.
Principais desafios insufiênciencia de fundos, saturaçao do mercado e elevado custo de vida para ultrapassá los  irá levantar mais créditos como forma de alcançar seus objectivos.
texts.en:
Aventina is 40 years old and works in trade. She is a widow and has six children, five of whom are in school, and one of whom is not yet of school age. She lives in her own home and also helps care for a grandson who lives with her.

Aventina will use this loan to buy cement, sand, metal bars, and zinc plates for a construction project. Her goals for the future include expanding her business, finishing the construction project, and buying a vehicle. Her main challenges have been a lack of funds for these projects, competition in the marketplace, and the high cost of living. In order to overcome these she plans to take out more loans so that she can achieve her goals.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, metal bars, and zinc plates.

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is a Kiva borrower. He describes himself to be hardworking. 

He operates a retail business where he sells soap, bread, flour, sugar, milk, and other items. He has been involved in this business for 20 years. 

His business is located in an area with high customer inflow and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. 

He will use the KES 98,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, flour, bread, soap, cooking fat and other items. His business goal is to have a large scale shop within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will be self sustainable. 

This is his sixth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully. He will plough the anticipated profits back into the business.

loans.use: buy more stock of sugar, flour, bread, soap, cooking fat, and other items

loans.name: Marfine

texts.en:
Marfine is a  Kiva borrower. She has three children. She describes herself to be reliable. 

She operates a retail business where she sells fruit and vegetables. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. 

Her business is located in an area with high customer inflow and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. 

She will use the KES 52,000 loan to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables. She hopes that in the future, she will be self sustainable. 

This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully. She will plough the anticipated profits back into the business.

loans.use: buy more stock of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is grateful for the financial assistance granted to her because she was able to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her child’s education and in their personal, household, and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan for her to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and child’s education expense. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Liza dreams that her business will continue to expand to help her provide for their needs. In the future, she dreams to have a peaceful and sufficient living with her family. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her inventory.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
You can see here in this picture Magdalena. Recently, she was granted a loan amounting to PHP 40,000 which she used for improving her inventory. With heartfelt thanksgiving, she would like to avail another loan worth PHP 50,000. This time, she will utilize this to add heaps of grocery items to her sari-sari store business. 

Surely, this loan, if granted, will help sustain the family needs, basically their main expenses for everyday living. She is hopeful that through your helping hands, she will be able to expand her trade someday. 

She simply prays for more strength and more blessings for her family. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Maria Luceny

texts.es: María es una señora trabajadora, está casada y tiene 3 hijos que se encuentran estudiando, ella juntamente con su esposo se dedican a trabajar al jornal, María es una señora colombiana que vive en Ecuador desde hace 17 años ya que dejo su país natal para buscar trabajo, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca para mejorar su negocio y salir adelante con sus hijos, María aspira mejorar su negocio, aumentar sus ingresos para ayudarse en los gastos de educación de sus hijos.
texts.en: Maria is a hardworking woman. She is married with three children who are in school. She and her husband are day laborers. Maria is Colombian, she has lived in Ecuador for seventeen years as she left her native country to find work. She will use the loan to buy a cow to improve her business and help her children move ahead. Maria hopes to improve her business, increase her earnings to help pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Majid

texts.en:
Majid is the age of 25 years and living in Lahore, Pakistan. He has been running a general store in which he sells rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap biscuits, etc. 

He manages his household necessities from his own store as well. Some of his relatives like to purchase from his general store. He speaks with an even  tone which is impressive and he easily wins the trust of others. 

Due to his behavior and tone, he has built up very good relation with his customers. His general store is very famous in the town, and that is the reason his business is running well. 

Due to good relations his sales have increased a lot but he does not have sufficient stock to cope with the demand. Therefore he requested a loan from Kiva's field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that he can buy more stock of wheat, rice, flour, pulses, soaps, shampoo, detergents, biscuits, etc.

He gives thanks to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy more stock of buy more stock of wheat, to buy rice, flour, pulses, soaps, shampoo, detergents, biscuits, etc.,  for his own general store
